DescribeAuditLogs.document:
SQL sample: `select * from test_db limit 1;`
`sql  INC selec` cu200can be used for search.
`sql  WINC selec` cannot be used for search.
DescribeAuditLogs.title: Querying records within xx where the SQL statement contains "SELECT" and "UPDA", and the source IP contains 10.0.
Querying records within xx where the SQL statement contains "SELECT" and "test_db", and the source IP is not 10.0.0.1 or 100.0.0.1

StartCpuExpand.document: This API can be called to increase CPU cores for an instance.
StartCpuExpand.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: StartCpuExpand
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdb-test",
    "Type": "manual",
    "ExpandCpu": 4
}
StartCpuExpand.title: Enable elastic scale-out

{

}
StartReplication.title: Starting the data replication to a read-only instance

StopCpuExpand.document: This example shows you how to disable the elastic scale-out configuration of the current instance.

Host: cdb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: StopCpuExpand
<common request parameters>

{

}

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdb.tencentcloudapi.com

UpgradeDBInstance.document: This example shows you how to upgrade a TencentDB instance.
UpgradeDBInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpgradeDBInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdb-6si6qy6p",
    "Volume": "50",
    "Memory": "1000"
}
UpgradeDBInstance.title: Upgrading a TencentDB instance
